SERVER_NAME_HELP1: Your MQTT Server network name or IP address
USERNAME_HELP1: Enter your MQTT server username - if required
PASSWORD_HELP1: Enter your MQTT server password - if required
TLS_HELP1: Enable TLS support, currently special certificates are not supported
IP_VERSION_HELP: Select the IP version to use for the connection
IP_VERSION_OPT1: Auto - attempt to detect the correct version
PROTOCOL_VERSION_HELP1: Select the MQTT protocol version to use for the connection
ON_DATA_UPDATE: Messages are sent when the data updates
TEMPLATE_FILE_HELP1: Specify the name of the template file in the /mqtt folder to define the topic(s) and format the content of these messages
